## ParagraphBreak.size property

Size of the current node.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly size = 1;
```

## Remarks

The size of flow content is measured in UTF-16 characters and all nodes, except [text runs](./scribing.textrun.md)<!-- -->, are defined to have size 1.
